message: A lifetime with you is the gift of the lifetime
Happy Valentine's Day, my love. Language is inadequate, music is powerless, songs are helpless to shower my love
Kiss day: Are you kidding me, why does your kiss restart my system and reboots my processor? :)
Hug Day: Your hug is as relaxing as a properly refactored code!! It restarts my soul and cleans my memory
Promise Day: Promise me, you love me. There can't be any exceptions :)
Teddy Day: You are as warm as the nice try-catch block in an exception
Chocolate Day: Life with you is sweeter than a code without bugs
Propose Day: Stuck in an infinite loop: If I had to ask you again, I still would â€” in every lifetime, in every universe.
